meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Botswana.
meanings.sent1: In Botswana, you can buy many things with just one thebe.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for the local currency and received some thebe.
meanings.sent3: The thebe in my pocket jingled happily as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a shiny thebe.
meanings.sent5: The thebe sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A coin worth one hundredth of a Botswanan pula.
meanings.sent1: I found a thebe on the ground and picked it up for good luck.
meanings.sent2: She dropped a thebe into the charity donation box.
meanings.sent3: The thebe rolled away, playing hard to get.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a thebe, small but valuable.
meanings.sent5: The thebe slipped through the slot, making a satisfying clink.
